faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: You can also ask questions via chat

q1.question: Is registration free?
q1.answer: Yes, everything from registration to employment is free.

q2.question: Is it okay if I don't speak Japanese?
q2.answer: We provide support in your native language. Don't worry if Japanese is difficult.

q3.question: What kind of jobs are available?
q3.answer: Currently, we mainly handle nursing care positions.

q4.question: Will you help with visa procedures?
q4.answer: Yes, as a Registered Support Organization, we fully support visa applications and renewals.

q5.question: Will you help me find a place to live?
q5.answer: Yes, we provide housing search support. You can start your life in Japan with peace of mind.
